H0.text: In the USA in 1912, Theodore Roosevelt formed the Progressive Party when he lost the Republican nomination to William Howard Taft. What was the party also known as. New National Party

H1.text: In the USA in 1912, Theodore Roosevelt formed the Progressive Party when he lost the Republican nomination to William Howard Taft. What was the party also known as. Progressive Reform Party

H2.text: In the USA in 1912, Theodore Roosevelt formed the Progressive Party when he lost the Republican nomination to William Howard Taft. What was the party also known as. Teddy's Tigers

H3.text: In the USA in 1912, Theodore Roosevelt formed the Progressive Party when he lost the Republican nomination to William Howard Taft. What was the party also known as. Bull-Moose

A4.text: The Progressive Party, popularly nicknamed the Bull Moose Party,

A5.text: The 'Bull Moose' nickname originated when Roosevelt boasted that he felt 'strong as a bull moose' after losing the Republican nomination.
